title: A Little something about us
creator_credit: Sze Ching Lee and School of Creative Arts, University of Melbourne
brief_description: Interviews with several young women from diverse Asian backgrounds who, through pixellated images, share their aspirations, interests, and love-hate relationships with Mellbourne, the city that has adopted them.
